Class NEATGenomeDecoder

All Implemented Interfaces:
EvolutionObject, GenomeDecoder<GeneMap,NeuralNetwork>
public class NEATGenomeDecoder
extends AbstractGenomeDecoder<GeneMap,NeuralNetwork>

NEATGenomeDecoder creates phenotype NeuralNetwork from NEATGenome with GeneMap data.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda

Description copied from interface: GenomeDecoder
Creates an instance of the phenotype represented by the given Genome's data, which is appropriate for simulating in the problem domain.

Returns:
the created phenotype instance

buildNeurons

private void buildNeurons(java.util.List<Neuron> neurons,
                          java.util.Map<XId,java.lang.Integer> indexMap,
                          java.util.List<NodeGene> nodes)
Adds to the given neurons list Neurons created using the corresponding NodeGenes. Assumes that all of the given NodeGene are have the same NodeType

Parameters:
neurons - the Neuron list being built
indexMap - map from NodeGene id to their corresponding Neuron's index in the neuron list
nodes - the NodeGenes used to create neurons
